entry.title: Basic Pentesting - JT
entry.summary:
Target: 10.10.10.10 Attacker: 10.10.14.1
Introduction The “Basic Pentesting” room on TryHackMe is designed for beginners to gain practical experience in penetration testing. The goal is to walk through key phases of an attack such as scanning, enumeration, and exploitation.
Room Link: Basic Pentesting – TryHackMe
Tools Used: nmap, gobuster, hydra,ssh,john2ssh, john, smbclient
Step 1: Initia...

entry.title: ignite
entry.summary:
Introduction The goal of this room is to identify a vulnerability in a PHP-based web server and exploit it by uploading a reverse shell to gain unauthorized access to the system.
Room Link: ignite – TryHackMe
Tools Used: nmap,nc,reverse shell,browser
Step 1: Initial Enumeration Nmap Scan $ nmap -sC -sV -oN nmap.txt 10.10.161.15 Starting Nmap 7.95 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2025-04-15 22:38 EDT ...

entry.title: OhSINT
entry.summary:
Introduction
The OhSINT room on TryHackMe is a beginner-friendly OSINT (Open Source Intelligence) challenge that demonstrates how much sensitive information can be extracted from a single publicly shared image.
Room Link: OhSINT – TryHackMe
Tools Used: exiftool, Google, Twitter, Wigle.net
Step 1: Downloading &amp; Analyzing the Image The challenge provides an image file ( WindowsXP_15517190...
